questions.quote: Yeah, yeah, I know.  Listen, Jerry, I can't let you come to my New Year's party.
Oh, um, before I forget, . . . Cuban cigars. It's a present from my father.
Oh, The Muted Heart. Glen Close. Sally Field. Well, that should be good.
All right, let's go. We don't have much time before the meeting.
Yes! This guy ripped me off! He stole that statue right out of my house!
You start flirting with him and I'll come by and, while you're keeping him busy, I'll slip it in his drink.
It's a Twix! They're all Twix! It was a setup! A setup, I tell ya! And you've robbed it! You've all screwed me again! Now, gimme one! Gimme a Twix!
Okay, pudgy, lets stop playing games. What happened with margaret?
If you got into a car accident, I can guarantee you I wouldn't stop for Jujyfruit!
Pennsylvania Dutch country? Oh, that's the serious relationship weekend place.
